column2: "Nkyii so sɛ hom rotwe asaase no ho tonto akyɛ egyapadze a
column3: hom nyi do ayɛyɛdze mma EWURADZE
column4: dɛ asaase no mu kyɛfa krɔnkrɔn: ne tsentsen nyɛ ndzɛmbir ne tsentsen basafa mpem duebien nye ahaenum
column5: na ne tɛtɛr nyɛ mpemdu: ɔnyɛ krɔnkrɔn wɔ n’ahe do nyinara nhyiahyia."

column2: "Susu iyi mu dza ne tsentsen yɛ basafa ahaebien eduonum na ne tɛtɛr yɛ basafa ahaebien eduonum a ɔda etwaanan hyia ma krɔnkrɔnbea no; na basafa eduonu enum nyɛ ne mfikyir asaase ntwa ho nhyia."
"Na nsusui yi ara mu na susu dza ne tsentsen yɛ basafa mpem duebien nye ahaenum
column3: na ne tɛtɛr yɛ mpemdu: na iyi mu na krɔnkrɔnbea no

column2: "Asaase no mu akrɔnkrɔndze nye no
column3: ɔnyɛ asɔfo no dze
column4: krɔnkrɔnbea asomfo a wɔtwe bɛn bɔsom EWURADZE; na ɔnyɛ hɔn adan sisibea
column5: na bea krɔnkrɔn mma krɔnkrɔnbea no."

column2: "Na dza ne tsentsen yɛ basafa mpem duebien nye ahaenum
column3: na ne tɛtɛr yɛ basafa mpemenum no ɔnyɛ Levifo a wɔyɛ fi no mu asomfo no dze

column2: "Na hom nyi kurow no ne kyɛfa a ne tɛtɛr yɛ basafa mpem ebien nye ahaenum
column3: na ne tsentsen yɛ basafa mpem duebien nye ahaenum wɔ krɔnkrɔnbea ayɛyɛdze no ne nkyɛn: na ɔnyɛ Israel fifo no nyinara dze."

column2: "Na bapɔmba no n’afamudze biara ɔda ayɛyɛdze krɔnkrɔn na kurow no ne kyɛfa ha na ha
column3: wɔ ayɛyɛdze krɔnkrɔn no enyim
column4: na kurow no ne kyɛfa enyim
column5: wɔ anee afamu dze rokɔ anee
column6: na boka afamu dze rokɔ boka: na ne tsentsen ɔnye kyɛfa no mu kor nsɛ
column7: mfi anee he do nkɔ boka he do."

column2: "Asaase no do ɔnyɛ ne kyɛfa wɔ Israel mu: na mma me mbapɔmba nnda ho nnhyɛ me man do bio; na mbom wɔmfa asaase no mma Israel fifo dɛ mbrɛ hɔn mbusuakuw tsetsee."
"Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Israel mbapɔmba
column3: hom mma ɔndɔɔ hom so: hom nyi emimdzi na nhyɛdo
column4: na hom nyɛ atsɛmbudze na pɛrpɛr; hom ngyaa me man epoobɔ

column2: "Hom nya nsɛn tsenn
column3: na efa tsenn

column2: "Esusudze efa na bat nsusui nyɛ kor
column3: na bat no nyɛ esusudze homer nkyɛmu du mu kor
column4: na efa no nyɛ homer nkyɛmu du mu kor: no nsusui nyɛ dɛ homer dze."

column2: "Na dwetɛbona nyɛ gera eduonu: hom mina nyɛ dwetɛbona eduonu
column3: dwetɛbona eduonu enum

column2: "Iyi nye ayɛyɛdze a hom mfa mma; ewifua homer mu efa nkyɛmu esia mu kor
column3: na hom mfa atoko homer mu efa nkyɛmu esia mu kor mma:"

column2: "na ngo ho nhyehyɛɛ no dze
column3: ngo bat no
column4: bat nkyɛmu du mu kor na hom mfa mfi susukora a ɔyɛ homer a odzi bat du no mu ma; na bat du ɔyɛ homer kor:"

column2: "na eguambaa kor mfi nguankuw no mu
column3: nguan ahaenu a wɔwɔ Israel dzidzibea a ɔyɛ fɔɔfɔɔ no mu; ma ɔnyɛ edziban afɔr na hyew afɔr

column2: "Asaase no do nkorɔfo nyinara mfa ayɛyɛdze yi mma Israel mu bapɔmba."
"Na bapɔmba no n’afamu dze nye dɛ ɔma hyew afɔr na edziban afɔr
column3: na ɔnom afɔr
column7: wɔ Israel fifo afahyɛ a wɔahyehyɛ nyinara mu: ɔno na onsiesie bɔn ho afɔr no
column9: na hyew afɔr no na asomdwee afɔr no wɔdze ayɛ mpata ama Israel fifo."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE Nyankopɔn se nye iyi: Bosoom a odzi kan no mu no
column3: bosoom no ne da a odzi kan no mu no
column4: fa nantwifɔr a onndzii dzɛm; na tsew krɔnkrɔnbea no ho."

column2: "Na sɔfo no mfa bɔn ho afɔr no bɔgyaa no bi
column3: na ɔmfa ngugu fi no n’apondua no
column4: na afɔrmbukyia no ne bamba aduodoo anan no na fie afamu abangua no n’abobokɛse apondua no ho."

column2: "Na dɛmara na hom nyɛ no bosoom no ne da a otsia esuon no mma biara a ɔfom
column3: na nyia ɔyɛ kotobonyi no: dɛm na hom mfa nyɛ mpata mma fi no."

column2: "Na bosoom a odzi kan no
column3: ne da a otsia duanan no
column5: ndaesuon afahyɛ no; epitsi na wondzi."

column2: "Na da no mu no bapɔmba no mfa nantwinyin nsiesie nankasa na asaase no do nkorɔfo nyinara tsir do bɔn ho afɔr."
"Na afahyɛ no ne ndaesuon no
column3: onsiesie hyew afɔr mma EWURADZE
column4: anantwinyin esuon na nguannyin esuon a wonndzii dzɛm daa daa ndaesuon; na bɔn ho afɔr so apɔnkyenyin daa daa."

column2: "Na onsiesie edziban afɔr so
column3: nantwinyin kor dze efah kor na dwanyin kor dze efa kor
column4: na ngo hin kor nka efa kor ho."

column2: "Bosoom a otsia esuon no mu
column3: bosoom ne da a otsia duenum no mu
column5: ɔnyɛ dɛmara ndaesuon: dɛ mbrɛ bɔn ho afɔr no tse
column6: dɛ mbrɛ hyew afɔr no tse
column7: na dɛ mbrɛ edziban afɔr no tse
column8: na dɛ mbrɛ ngo no tse."
